message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper is about a novel method for text classification tasks that combines attention mechanisms and dynamic network configuration in convolutional neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a new method that improves performance while requiring less computation, which suggests that it could be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the method involves selecting a subset of elements to attend to, which could be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
